01-01-01-01.content_summary: Opening homage and identification of the teacher as Samantabhadra's emanation. Explanation of how the Buddha's display appears to sentient beings through the teacher's emanations across the three times.
01-01-01-01.english_title: The First Lecture Hall: Arrangement of the Perfect Teacher

01-01-02-01.content_summary: Meeting between father and son (Samantabhadra and emanations). Detailed explanation of the Buddha's twelve deeds and emanation displays for disciples.

01-01-03-01.content_summary: The seven qualities of perfection—place, teacher, retinue, time, teaching, and intention. Detailed enumeration of the twelve deeds.
01-01-03-01.chapter_end: Chapter 1 ends at page 25, line 915 (no རིམ་ཁང་ marker, continuous text)
